languages.text: "Объяснения? Лорд-инквизитор Ксавьер Калькасар счел необходимым после наблюдения за новым Вольным Торговцем фон Валанциус в социальной среде провести уединенную беседу. С элементом неожиданности, который обычно располагает собеседника к более прямому разговору и менее подготовленным ответам. Ты, {name}, остал{mf|ся|ась} цел{mf||а} и невредим{mf||а} — поверь мне, это более чем удачный финал разговора с моим наставником. Более того, тебе преподнесли подарок — официальное выражение отношения к тебе и твоим деяниям. Я затрудняюсь добавить к этому что либо еще".

"An explanation? Lord Inquisitor Xavier Calcazar deemed it necessary, after observing the new Rogue Trader von Valancius in a social setting, to have a private conversation with you. The lack of warning is used to dispose the subject toward a more direct conversation and less prepared answers. You, {name}, emerged whole and unscathed from the encounter — trust me, that counts as more than a happy ending to a conversation with my mentor. And you have been given a gift — an official demonstration of his opinion of you and your activities. I will struggle to find anything to add to that."
languages.original_text: "Объяснения? Лорд-инквизитор Ксавьер Калькасар счел необходимым после наблюдения за новым Вольным Торговцем фон Валанциус в социальной среде провести уединенную беседу. languages.text: «¿Una explicación? El Lord Inquisidor Xavier Calcazar estimó necesario, tras observar {mf|al nuevo|a la nueva} Comerciante Independiente von Valancius en un contexto social, mantener una charla privada con usted. La ausencia de una invitación formal predispone al sujeto a una conversación más directa y evita que se preparen las respuestas. Usted, {name}, ha salido indemne del encuentro; confíe en mí, eso puede considerarse un final más que feliz para cualquier entrevista con mi mentor. Y le ha sido concedido un verdadero regalo, una declaración oficial de su opinión sobre usted y sus actividades. Me esforzaré por buscar algo que añadir a todo eso».
languages.original_text: "An explanation? Lord Inquisitor Xavier Calcazar deemed it necessary, after observing the new Rogue Trader von Valancius in a social setting, to have a private conversation with you. The lack of warning is used to dispose the subject toward a more direct conversation and less prepared answers. You, {name}, emerged whole and unscathed from the encounter — trust me, that counts as more than a happy ending to a conversation with my mentor. And you have been given a gift — an official demonstration of his opinion of you and your activities. I will struggle to find anything to add to that."

La ausencia de una invitación formal predispone al sujeto a una conversación más directa y evita que se preparen las respuestas. Usted, {name}, ha salido indemne del encuentro; confíe en mí, eso puede considerarse un final más que feliz para cualquier entrevista con mi mentor. Y le ha sido concedido un verdadero regalo, una declaración oficial de su opinión sobre usted y sus actividades. Me esforzaré por buscar algo que añadir a todo eso».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「説明？ ロード・インクィジターのザビエル・カルカサル、新任の自由開拓者フォン・ヴァランシウスを社交の場で観察した後、あなたと個人的な会話をする必要があるとお考えになられた。警告がなかったのは、対象とより直接的で素直な話を聞き取るためだ。{name}、あなたは事なきを得た。恩師との会話が『良い』方向に終わるよりも望ましいことだ。しかも、あなたは贈り物を賜った…あなたと、その活動に対する彼の評価を公式に示してもらえた。俺から付け加えることは何もない」
languages.original_text: "An explanation? Lord Inquisitor Xavier Calcazar deemed it necessary, after observing the new Rogue Trader von Valancius in a social setting, to have a private conversation with you. The lack of warning is used to dispose the subject toward a more direct conversation and less prepared answers. You, {name}, emerged whole and unscathed from the encounter — trust me, that counts as more than a happy ending to a conversation with my mentor. And you have been given a gift — an official demonstration of his opinion of you and your activities. I will struggle to find anything to add to that."

traits.locale_text: 「説明？ ロード・インクィジターのザビエル・カルカサル、新任の自由開拓者フォン・ヴァランシウスを社交の場で観察した後、あなたと個人的な会話をする必要があるとお考えになられた。警告がなかったのは、対象とより直接的で素直な話を聞き取るためだ。{name}、あなたは事なきを得た。恩師との会話が『良い』方向に終わるよりも望ましいことだ。しかも、あなたは贈り物を賜った…あなたと、その活動に対する彼の評価を公式に示してもらえた。俺から付け加えることは何もない」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “解释？大审判官希维尔·卡尔卡扎在社交场合观察了冯·瓦兰修斯家族的新任行商浪人，认为有必要和你私下谈谈。他之所以没有提前和你打招呼，是为了能让你从实招来，而不是念出准备好的答案。至于你，{name}，这场谈话结束之后，你依然安然无恙。相信我，这才是最重要的，比你是否与我的导师谈笑风生重要得多。而且，你已经得到了一份礼物，你得到了他本人的官方证明，了解了他对你本人与你的所作所为的看法。恐怕我没有别的话可以补充了。”
languages.original_text: "An explanation? Lord Inquisitor Xavier Calcazar deemed it necessary, after observing the new Rogue Trader von Valancius in a social setting, to have a private conversation with you. The lack of warning is used to dispose the subject toward a more direct conversation and less prepared answers. You, {name}, emerged whole and unscathed from the encounter — trust me, that counts as more than a happy ending to a conversation with my mentor. And you have been given a gift — an official demonstration of his opinion of you and your activities. I will struggle to find anything to add to that."

traits.locale_text: “解释？希维尔·卡尔卡扎审判长在社交场合观察了冯·瓦兰修斯家族的新任行商浪人，认为有必要和你私下谈谈。他之所以没有提前和你打招呼，是为了能让你从实招来，而不是念出准备好的答案。至于你，{name}，这场谈话结束之后，你依然安然无恙。相信我，这才是最重要的，比你是否与我的导师谈笑风生重要得到。而且，你已经得到了一份礼物，你得到了他本人的官方证明，了解了他对你本人与你的所作所为的看法。恐怕我没有别的话可以补充了。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Une explication ? Après avoir observé {mf|le nouveau libre-marchand|la nouvelle libre-marchande} von Valancius dans un cadre social, le seigneur inquisiteur Xavier Calcazar a jugé nécessaire d'avoir un entretien privé avec vous. Cette demande inopinée a pour but de créer les conditions d'une conversation sans faux semblants afin d'obtenir des réponses plus spontanées. Vous êtes {mf|sorti|sortie} indemne de cette rencontre, {name}. C'est une conclusion des plus heureuses lorsque l'on connaît mon mentor, croyez-moi. Vous avez même reçu un présent : son opinion officielle sur vos activités et vous-même. Je ne vois pas ce que je pourrais ajouter à cela. »
languages.original_text: "An explanation? Lord Inquisitor Xavier Calcazar deemed it necessary, after observing the new Rogue Trader von Valancius in a social setting, to have a private conversation with you. The lack of warning is used to dispose the subject toward a more direct conversation and less prepared answers. You, {name}, emerged whole and unscathed from the encounter — trust me, that counts as more than a happy ending to a conversation with my mentor. And you have been given a gift — an official demonstration of his opinion of you and your activities. I will struggle to find anything to add to that."

Cette demande inopinée a pour but de créer les conditions d'une conversation sans faux semblants afin d'obtenir des réponses plus spontanées. Vous êtes {mf|sorti|sortie} indemne de cette rencontre, {name}. C'est une conclusion des plus heureuses lorsque l'on connaît mon mentor, croyez-moi. Vous avez même reçu un présent : son opinion officielle sur vos activités et vous-même. Je ne vois pas ce que je pourrais ajouter à cela. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Eine Erklärung? Nachdem Großinquisitor Xavier Calcazar {mf|den neuen Freihändler|die neue Freihändler} von Valancius in einer gesellschaftlichen Situation beobachtet hat, hielt er es für notwendig, eine private Unterhaltung mit Euch zu führen. Dass keine Vorwarnung erfolgt, soll Euch zu einer direkteren Konversation und spontaneren Antworten verleiten. Ihr, {name}, habt diese Begegnung völlig unversehrt überstanden. Glaubt mir, dass ist mehr wert als ein glückliches Ende einer Unterhaltung mit meinem Mentor. Und Ihr habt ein Geschenk erhalten: eine offizielle Demonstration seiner Meinung über Euch und Eure Aktivitäten. Es wird mir schwerfallen, dazu noch etwas zu ergänzen."
languages.original_text: "An explanation? Lord Inquisitor Xavier Calcazar deemed it necessary, after observing the new Rogue Trader von Valancius in a social setting, to have a private conversation with you. The lack of warning is used to dispose the subject toward a more direct conversation and less prepared answers. You, {name}, emerged whole and unscathed from the encounter — trust me, that counts as more than a happy ending to a conversation with my mentor. And you have been given a gift — an official demonstration of his opinion of you and your activities. I will struggle to find anything to add to that."

Nachdem Großinquisitor Xavier Calcazar {mf|den neuen Freihändler|die neue Freihändler} von Valancius in einer gesellschaftlichen Situation beobachtet hat, hielt er es für notwendig, eine private Unterhaltung mit Euch zu führen. Dass keine Vorwarnung erfolgt, soll Euch zu einer direkteren Konversation und spontaneren Antworten verleiten. Ihr, {name}, habt diese Begegnung völlig unversehrt überstanden. Und Ihr habt ein Geschenk erhalten: eine offizielle Demonstration seiner Meinung über Euch und Eure Aktivitäten. Es wird mir schwerfallen, dazu noch etwas zu ergänzen."

Lord Inquisitor Xavier Calcazar deemed it necessary, after observing the new Rogue Trader von Valancius in a social setting, to have a private conversation with you. The lack of warning is used to dispose the subject toward a more direct conversation and less prepared answers. You, , emerged whole and unscathed from the encounter — trust me, that counts as more than a happy ending to a conversation with my mentor. And you have been given a gift — an official demonstration of his opinion of you and your activities. I will struggle to find anything to add to that."

languages.text: "Hay hay, açıklayayım... Lord Engizisyoncu Xavier Calcazar, yeni Hür Tacir von Valancius'u cemiyet ortamında gözlemledikten sonra yüz yüze konuşmayı münasip gördü. Uyarıda bulunmamak suretiyle de hazır cevapların önüne geçmiş, daha doğal bir konuşmaya zemin hazırlamış bulunduk. Hem sonunda başına hiçbir şey gelmedi {name}. Bakma, yönderimle görüşüp tek parça ayrılanların sayısı pek azdır. Üstüne bir de armağan aldın. Seni ve eylemlerini nasıl değerlendiriyor, resmen görmüş oldun. Daha da ne söyleyeyim bilmiyorum."
languages.original_text: "An explanation? Lord Inquisitor Xavier Calcazar deemed it necessary, after observing the new Rogue Trader von Valancius in a social setting, to have a private conversation with you. The lack of warning is used to dispose the subject toward a more direct conversation and less prepared answers. You, {name}, emerged whole and unscathed from the encounter — trust me, that counts as more than a happy ending to a conversation with my mentor. And you have been given a gift — an official demonstration of his opinion of you and your activities. I will struggle to find anything to add to that."

traits.locale_text: "Hay hay, açıklayayım... Lord Engizisyoncu Xavier Calcazar, yeni Hür Tacir von Valancius'u cemiyet ortamında gözlemledikten sonra bire bir konuşmayı münasip gördü. Zatıalinizi uyarmamak suretiyle de hazır cevapların önüne geçmiş, daha doğal bir konuşmaya zemin hazırlamış bulunduk. Hem sonunda başına hiçbir şey gelmedi {name}. Bakma, mentorumla görüşüp tek parça ayrılanların sayısı pek azdır. Üstüne bir de armağan aldın. Seni ve eylemlerini nasıl değerlendiriyor, resmen görmüş oldun. Daha da ne söyleyeyim, bilmiyorum."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
